contexts.context: ...Betony and the lawless times that followed. There are even <mark>rumors</mark> that King Gothryd of Daggerfall may institute the Imperial practice of...
...slaves that are purchased in Tear by Sload merchants and the <mark>rumors</mark> of Sload airships carrying corpses from Senchal.
<mark>Rumors</mark> flow from the House of Troubles.
